          (, ,))))))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT all) (NNP Black) (NNP Tea))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (RB fully) (JJ oxidized))))

    (S
      (NP (EX there))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (ADVP (RB so)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ many) (JJ different) (NNS styles))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (NNP Black) (NNP Tea)))))

            (SBAR
              (SBAR

                    (ADJP (JJ processed)))))

    (NP (EX there))

          (NNP Assam))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WDT which))
          (S
            (VP (VBP are)
              (NP
                (NP (NNP Black) (NNP Teas))
                (VP (VBN characterized)
                  (PP (IN by)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NN region))

                        (NP (NNP India)))

                        (WHPP (IN in)
                          (WHNP (WDT which)))

                          (NP (PRP they))

    (. .)))

            (ADVP (RB just))
            (VP
              (VP (MD ca) (RB n't)
                (VP (VB help)))
              (CC but)
              (VP (VBP want)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB have)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT an) (NNP English) (NNP High) (NNP Tea))
                        (PP (IN throughout)
                          (NP (DT the) (NN day)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(place-4, it-1)
cop(place-4, is-2)
det(place-4, a-3)
root(ROOT-0, place-4)
advmod(help-10, where-5)
nsubj(help-10, you-6)
advmod(help-10, just-7)
aux(help-10, ca-8)
neg(help-10, n't-9)
rcmod(place-4, help-10)
cc(help-10, but-11)
conj(help-10, want-12)
aux(have-14, to-13)
xcomp(want-12, have-14)
det(Tea-18, an-15)
nn(Tea-18, English-16)
nn(Tea-18, High-17)
dobj(have-14, Tea-18)
prep(Tea-18, throughout-19)

pobj(throughout-19, day-21)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJ rolling) (NN stage))
          (SBAR
            (WHADVP (WRB where))
            (S
              (S
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NNS cells))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN tea) (NNS leaves))))
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (ADJP (JJ bruised))))
              (CC and)
              (S
                (NP (DT this))
                (VP (VBZ sets)
                  (PRT (RP off))
                  (NP
                    (NP (DT a) (NN series))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN chemical) (NNS reactions)))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WDT which))
                      (S
                        (VP (VBZ produces)
                          (NP (NN fragrance)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(is-2, It-1)
root(ROOT-0, is-2)
prep(is-2, at-3)
det(stage-6, the-4)
amod(stage-6, rolling-5)
pobj(at-3, stage-6)
advmod(bruised-15, where-7)
det(cells-9, the-8)
nsubj(bruised-15, cells-9)
prep(cells-9, of-10)
det(leaves-13, the-11)
nn(leaves-13, tea-12)
pobj(of-10, leaves-13)
cop(bruised-15, are-14)
rcmod(stage-6, bruised-15)
cc(bruised-15, and-16)
nsubj(sets-18, this-17)
conj(bruised-15, sets-18)
prt(sets-18, off-19)
det(series-21, a-20)
dobj(sets-18, series-21)
prep(series-21, of-22)
nn(reactions-24, chemical-23)
pobj(of-22, reactions-24)
nsubj(produces-26, which-25)
rcmod(series-21, produces-26)
dobj(produces-26, fragrance-27)

  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNP CTC) (NN process))
    (VP (VBD was)

            (NP (DT a)
              (ADJP (JJ quick)
                (CC and)
                (NN cost))
              (NN saving) (NN method))

                    (NP (NN color))))))))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB Where))
    (SQ (VBZ does)
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VB come)
        (PP (IN from))))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Dilmah))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (NP
        (ADVP (RB very) (RB much))
        (NP (DT a) (NN family) (NN run) (NN company))
        (CC and)
        (ADVP (RB just))
        (RB about)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (CD one) (NN brand))
          (PP (IN on)
            (NP (PRP$ your) (NN supermarket) (NN shelf)))))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP
              (VP (VB bypass)
                (NP (DT the) (NN middleman)))
              (CC and)
              (VP (VB buy)
                (ADJP (JJ direct))
                (PP (IN from)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Tea) (NN manufacturer)))))))))
    (. .)))

nn(company-9, family-7)

cc(company-9, and-10)
advmod(company-9, just-11)
advmod(company-9, about-12)
det(brand-15, the-13)
num(brand-15, one-14)
dep(company-9, brand-15)
prep(brand-15, on-16)
poss(shelf-19, your-17)
nn(shelf-19, supermarket-18)
pobj(on-16, shelf-19)
advmod(bypass-23, where-20)
nsubj(bypass-23, you-21)
aux(bypass-23, can-22)
advcl(company-9, bypass-23)
det(middleman-25, the-24)
dobj(bypass-23, middleman-25)
cc(bypass-23, and-26)
conj(bypass-23, buy-27)
acomp(buy-27, direct-28)
prep(buy-27, from-29)

pobj(from-29, manufacturer-32)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ Their) (NNS teas))
    (VP (VBP are) (RB not)
      (ADVP (RB only))
      (VP (VBN made)
        (PP (IN with)
          (NP (NN passion)))
        (SBAR (CC but)
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (VP (VBP are)
              (VP (VBG doing)
                (NP (PRP it))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (DT an) (JJ ethical) (NN manner)))
                (SBAR (RB so) (IN that)
                  (S
                    (PP (IN with)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT every) (NN pack))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (NNP Dilmah) (NN tea)))))
                    (NP (PRP you))
                    (VP (VBP buy))))))))))
    (, ,)))

            (NP (PRP$ their) (NNS teas))))))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP Dilmah))

          (NP

              (NP (JJ flavored) (NNS teas))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT All))
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VBP have)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB do))))))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB sign)
            (PRT (RP up))
            (PP (IN at)
              (NP
                (NP (JJ http://dilmah.sg/trial-signup) (NNS ))
                (SBAR
                  (S
                    (VP (VBP Find)
                      (PRT (RP out))
                      (NP
                        (NP (JJR more))
                        (PP (IN about)
                          (NP (NNP Dilmah) (NNP Exceptional))))
                      (ADVP (RB here)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(is-6, All-1)
nsubj(have-3, you-2)
rcmod(All-1, have-3)
aux(do-5, to-4)
xcomp(have-3, do-5)
root(ROOT-0, is-6)
aux(sign-8, to-7)
xcomp(is-6, sign-8)
prt(sign-8, up-9)
prep(sign-8, at-10)
amod(-12, http://dilmah.sg/trial-signup-11)
pobj(at-10, -12)
rcmod(-12, Find-13)
prt(Find-13, out-14)
dobj(Find-13, more-15)
prep(more-15, about-16)
nn(Exceptional-18, Dilmah-17)
pobj(about-16, Exceptional-18)
advmod(Find-13, here-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Find)
      (PRT (RP out))
      (NP
        (NP (JJR more))
        (PP (IN about)
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WP what))
            (S
              (NP (NNP Dilmah))
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (VP (VBG doing)
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT the) (NNS people))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NNP Sri) (NNP Lanka)))))
                  (ADVP (RB here)))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Find-1)
prt(Find-1, out-2)
dobj(Find-1, more-3)
prep(more-3, about-4)
dobj(doing-8, what-5)
